  • Class
    Description
    CheckType
    Enumeration that defines the type of check that must be done on CommonGoal pattern.
    CommonGoal
    This class is used to represent the common goal cards that are split between the active Players in the lobby, when the Game is created.
    ConsecutiveTilesPatternGoal
    This class is used to represent those objects that contains the number of Tiles that must be consecutive for making a point considering the pattern of the goal.
    DiagonalEqualPattern
    Class to represent the goal pattern with all the Tiles disposed diagonally.
    Direction
    Enumeration that defines the type of direction that must be considered while checking onn a CommonGoal pattern.
    EightShapelessPatternGoal
    Class to represent the goal pattern with eight Tiles disposed in a shapeless form on the Board .
    FourCornersPatternGoal
    Class to represent the goal pattern with all Tiles disposed at the four corners of the Board .
    MinEqualsTilesPattern
    Class to represent the goal pattern with all Tiles disposed in the following pattern on the Board.
    StairPatternGoal
    Class to represent the goal pattern with all Tiles disposed to form a stair-shaped figure on the Board .
    TilesInPositionsPatternGoal
    Class to represent the goal pattern with all Tiles disposed in the given positions of the Board .
